body.name: Hello Bello Diapers, Size 4 (22-37 lbs) Surprise Pack for Girls - 84 Count of Premium Disposable Baby Diapers, Hypoallergenic with Soft, Cloth-Like Feel - Assorted Girl & Gender Neutral Patterns

features: Doody-catchers. Crap-sacks. Tinkle-poopers. Whatever you want to call them, our plant-based, super soft and absorbent disposable diapers are a modern convenience you don't want to live without
Say Hello to adorable Surprise designs. And say Goodbye to plain diapers. Our Surprise patterns are curated with girl and gender-neutral assortments for every parent's need. Go ahead, take your pick!
MADE WITHOUT: parabens, phthalates...basically, it's made with the good stuff.
Includes (1) 84ct surprise pack of diapers in girl & gender neutral designs for infants and toddlers (Size 4)
Hello Bello believes in giving back and has donated over 7 million diapers (and a heckuva lot of wipes and care products) to parents in need
body.description: Hello Bello Premium Baby Diapers are designed by parents, so we know first-hand that preventing leaks and blowouts is a must. Been there, done that, don't want to deal with it. We also wanted to create a diaper with ingredients we could be proud of, that was soft on sensitive skin, and was made with just as much consideration for the planet we live on as the babies we love - all at an affordable price. So that's just what we did. Box contains 84 count size 4 disposable baby diapers in Surprise Girl & Gender Neutral patterns.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Brand Promises Premium For All You shouldn’t have to choose between what’s best for your baby and what’s best for your budget. Our mission is to create the highest quality products at the most reasonable cost, because we believe every child deserves the best. Happier Babies, Happier Planet We love your littles, so from using organic botanicals in our body care to running our facilities on renewable energy, our products are thoughtfully created to be safe and effective for babies, and better for their world. Our Parent Pledge Parenting is hard for everyone, but much harder for those without adequate support. We’ve donated over 6 million diapers and are fighting for policy changes that will help end diaper need. We pledge to help however we can.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love these diapers!!
reviews.reviewText: Best hypoallergenic diaper on the market for fit and effectiveness! AND SURPRISE DESIGN PACKS! We love our hello bellos. very comfortable for baby, great sizing, and no leaks. Just buy them already!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My top choice
reviews.reviewText: These are my favorite choice, they last long their leak proof and they come in cute different shades.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The cutest prints
reviews.reviewText: I love the prints we got with the flowers and unicorns my only gripe with the size 4 diaper is that there is no pee line

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Not leak proof at all
reviews.reviewText: I would not recommend leaving on these diapers longer than 3 hours (depending on how much your baby has been fed). These are terrible for night time! They stop absorbing at some point and become really slippery. So an accident waiting to happen!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived quickly & works well
reviews.reviewText: The pattern they sent was very cute. These diapers work well for my active 2 year old. We never have leaks, and the closures stay fastened between diaper changes. I was pleased with how quickly they arrived. I'm not sure if the price is better than in store, but it's great to have them show up on autoship - no more last minute runs to the store for diapers. I feel dumb I didn't do this sooner!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sizing is not consistent
reviews.reviewText: Different designs seem to have different sizing. I added pics for reference. The purple one is a size 3 and is skinnier than the shapes one which is a size 2. Also these purple ones seem thinner than the other size 3 cactus designed ones I have. However the shapes one tended to leak when my baby sleeps on her side. The purple ones have not leaked so far. Maybe the skinnier ones work better for my baby even though she’s in the 95 percentile for weight. I’ve ordered the alphabet ones to see if the sizing is more consistent.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not bad but lots of leaks
reviews.reviewText: So one thing I didn’t like about the product was that when my baby would wear it all night in the morning she would leak through. There has also been more blowouts than normal as well.But they don’t have a “chemical” smell and they do feel soft and comfortable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Count is different
reviews.reviewText: I do love the hello hello brand although I have noticed that when ordering “size 3” surprise box some orders I receive 27 per pack and some orders I received 26 per pack for the same price which I don’t too much think is fair. Every order should receive 27 per pack of 4 if the price is the same
